Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

CompositionService.description: The CompositionService schema defines a Composition Service which represents the properties for the service and links to the resources available for composition.
CompositionService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the Composition Service Properties for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AllowOverprovisioning.description: This indicates whether this service is allowed to overprovision a composition relative to the composition request.
AllowOverprovisioning.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is allowed to overprovision a composition relative to the composition request.

AllowZoneAffinity.description: This indicates whether a client is allowed to request that given composition request is fulfilled by a specified Resource Zone.
AllowZoneAffinity.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether a client is allowed to request that given composition request is fulfilled by a specified Resource Zone.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

ResourceBlocks.description: The resource blocks available on the service.
ResourceBlocks.longDescription: This property shall contain the link to a collection of type ResourceBlockCollection.

ResourceZones.description: The resource zones available on the service.
ResourceZones.longDescription: This property shall contain the link to a collection of type ZoneCollection.

ServiceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is enabled.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #CompositionService.v1_1_0.CompositionService
